question: What is the theme of the 10th CMS VATAVARAN Environment and Wildlife Film Festival?
explanation: The 4-day long MoEF&CC  (Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change) and Centre for Media Studies (CMS) VATAVARAN-2019 Short Film Competition and Festival on Environment was held in New Delhi. The festival is being organized, exclusively on Environment and Wildlife along with the 10th Competitive edition of CMS VATAVARAN. This edition of the festival is focusing on theme “Celebrating Himalayas” in an attempt to highlight the importance of the spectacular mountain ecosystem in the current climate change discourse and action.
